rows.label: qev025804_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your miracle water is a scam, isn't it? It's nothing but
an antitoxin used to neutralize a very specific poison,
correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0002
rows.name:
Wake up, my friends! This Bringer of Miracles doesn't
exist, does it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0003
rows.name:
How sad that your lack of faith leads you to invent lies
that tear down others. I'm sure you have no proof for
these absurd claims.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0004
rows.name:
Proof? And what about you then? What proof do you
have that this this this invisible god of yours even
EXISTS, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0005
rows.name:
Why, his presence is manifest in the Ma-non healed by
his miracle water! What further proof do you require?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0006
rows.name:
Isn't that correct, everyone? Are you not all firm in
your belief of the Bringer of Miracles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0007
rows.name:
Er, you couldn't do anything for me when I went to see
you, Doctor, no? But her god cured me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0008
rows.name:
The Bringer of Miracles succeeded where Ma-non
science failed, okay? Fraisie is a savior, here to heal
all sick Ma-non with her god's miraculous power![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0009
rows.name: But it's not rational, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0010
rows.name: You have your answer, Doctor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0011
rows.name:
The Ma-non need the Bringer of Miracles, not a sad
man of "science" who refuses to see the truth in front
of his face. Now leave this place immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0040
rows.name: Malyteth, escort our guests out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Fraisie that Malyteth won't be coming back.

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0020
rows.name: Display

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0021
rows.name: Show Fraisie the bottle Malyteth was carrying.

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0012
rows.name:
What? She felt cornered and...drank the elixir?
And she died?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0013
rows.name: No! I never would have given her that if I knew she...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0014
rows.name: I gave that bottle to Malyteth! Why do you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0015
rows.name:
What perfect timing! I became a little impatient and
and and started the confrontation without you, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0016
rows.name:
Let me see that bottle, all right?
I'll end this farce here and now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0017
rows.name:
Fraisie, you yourself confirmed that this was in
Malyteth's possession, didn't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now look, everyone! See what happens when someone
drinks this, okay?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hrrngh...! This is is is poison...extracted from assassin
springtails and engineered...to affect only Ma-non,
isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0020
rows.name:
You were planning to dump this in Biahno Lake, then
claim it was a disease affecting the Ma-non who drink
that water and fall ill, weren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0021
rows.name:
Then, when they they...nnrgh!
When they drink your miracle cure...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0022
rows.name:
Ahh... Their symptoms vanish immediately, don't they?
A miracle indeed, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0023
rows.name: Wait wait wait! Is that really...? That's fraud, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0024
rows.name: Fraisie, is what the doctor says true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0025
rows.name:
Of course not! Whatever drug that doctor has,
he obviously cooked it up to undermine our beliefs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0030
rows.name: Testify

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that Fraisie's fingerprints should be on the bottle.

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0040
rows.name: Surmise

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest they investigate the church for similar bottles.

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0026
rows.name: Rgh... You lie...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'll have it checked out immediately.
Then we'll have our answers, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0028
rows.name: Rgh... You aren't going to find anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0029
rows.name:
Let's go go take a look right away.
Then we'll have our answers, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0030
rows.name:
Damn you, Malyteth! You had one job! ONE job!
And you couldn't even do THAT right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0031
rows.name:
RAAAAAAGH! Bringer of Miracles, render these fools
to ash with your burning light![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0032
rows.name:
You stand in defiance of our righteous and vengeful
god... Now you and your sins will be purged from this
world for all time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0033
rows.name:
Phew... I'm glad that whole mess is over with, right?
And I couldn't have done it without you, could I?
Here. Please take this, along with my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0034
rows.name:
This whole debacle just further proves to me that belief
in invisible, untestable things is is is madness, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0035
rows.name:
Ma-non have come this far without any gods,
haven't we? I'd say that's to to to our credit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0036
rows.name:
As a physician, I think it's my job to protect my
people from this sort of dangerous illusion in the
future, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0051
rows.name: Support Staccata's anti-religious fervor.

rows.label: qev025804_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025804_SEL0061
rows.name: Explain that not every belief is a scam.

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0037
rows.name:
I'm glad you agree. Let's both of us work to keep
New LA and its people on the path of reason, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0038
rows.name:
So you believe some supernatural being is out there
somewhere just...watching us? I'm afraid I just can't
understand this, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025804_MSG0039
rows.name:
But I respect your opinion, okay? So perhaps I'll
explore the matter further before I reach any final
conclusions.[ST:wait ]
